news_items.title: Work in local government
news_items.description: Help to make your community a safer, healthier and happier place to live and work, with a career that offers great benefits, support and flexible working. You can really make a difference when you start a career with a council.

news_items.title: In Person Adoption Information Event
news_items.description: Are you thinking about adoption and would like to find out more? We would love to meet you at our next in-person adoption information event in Hull on 10 February at 6pm.

news_items.title: Keeping warm this Winter
news_items.description: Warm Spaces are a network of places across the city where you can visit to get warm and enjoy a little company. You can access our Warm Spaces map, as well as help and support to keep warm.

news_items.title: Financial help and support
news_items.description: With so many forms, rules and systems it can be difficult to know where to begin, but there is free, confidential advice available which is easily accessed and can help make a difference.
